data.title: Services
data.text:
Couts Heating & Cooling, Inc. has a group of skilled Detailers with years of field experience and technical skills to excel in Building Information Modeling (BIM) allowing design and construction teams to work efficiently. Our Detailers have performed BIM Lead operations on several projects helping bring coordination of all major trades into one buildable 3D Model. With completion dates being critical to Client operations, our Detailers are key to getting our project started productively and keeping the flow of construction moving with ongoing coordination throughout.

Couts Heating & Cooling, Inc. has some of the best Sheet Metal Foreman in the industry with most being developed within from Apprenticeship and are led by a strong Superintendent that is well established throughout the industry. Our crews are experienced in OSHPD, DSA, County and City Codes and Practices. Some of our projects include Hospitals, Colleges, High Schools, K-8, Performing Arts, Arenas, Resorts, Public Works, County/City Facilities, etc.

Our field personnel are trained in the newest technology, including Navisworks and Bluebeam for onsite collaboration with other trades. Couts has trained techs operating Trimble Equipment for digital layouts coordinated through our in-house detailing department using BIM.

We also have a TABB Certified Tech and Certified Structural Welders to handle any project requirements. All Couts employees receive safety training for certifications of OSHA 30, Fall Protection, Rigging, Forklift, Ariel Lift, etc.

Over the years, Couts Heating & Cooling, Inc. has developed a highly respected and innovative Piping Department. Technology is ever changing and as systems become more complex, we recognize the importance of staying ahead of the curve. Couts maintains a tight connection between office and field to provide quality systems to our Clients that fit within their needs and budgets. Our Piping Department specializes in Central Plants, VRF Refrigeration Systems, Steam Piping, Concrete Thermal Cooling, and Composting Facility Piping to highlight a few.

Coutsâ€™ Piping Department prides itself on having skilled top notch employees putting safety and training first. Many of our Superintendents, General Foreman and our Foreman have been developed from within since Apprenticeship which gives us some of the strongest crews in the business. We provide our crews with the equipment required to work effectively and efficiently making us a one-stop shop from pre-insulated underground piping to high bay distribution.
